text:
e="preserve">"Filthy" is a song recorded by American entertainer Justin Timberlake. It is the lead single from his fifth studio album, "Man of the Woods". The song was released on January 5, 2018, along with its music video. The song was written by Timberlake, Danja, Timbaland, James Fauntleroy, and Larrance Levar Dopson, while the first three of these produced the song.
Timberlake performed "Filthy" at his Super Bowl LII Halftime Show in Minneapolis, Minnesota, on February 4, 2018.
Charts.
The song entered at number nine on the "Billboard" Hot 100. It also charted in the top 15 in the UK.
Music video.
The video for the song features Timberlake dressed in a black sweater, jeans, and glasses, typical of the late CEO of Apple Inc., Steve Jobs. In the video, Timberlake demonstrates a robot.
